  html_document:
    keep_md: true

1. Is there a correlation between sensory processing disorder and domestic violence arrests? In other words, are people with sensory processing disorder more likely to be accused of domestic violence?

2. Which car makes and models have the lowest cost of ownership (maintenance, repairs, fuel, etc.) up to 250K miles?

3. Is there a correlation between vitamin supplement consumption (probably measured by amount spent on those supplements within a specific time frame) and long-term healthcare costs? What about lifespan, if we only include death by natural causes?

4. At what level of income do people have the most debt? What trends are common to those with the most and least amount of debt?

5. Do school districts with higher budgets tend to score higher on tests? Lower? The same?

6. What personality types, as defined by a reputable personality test, create the most successful startups by revenue? Which of the types produce the most revenue?
